p: Dependence on soybean meal as a protein source in animal feed poses environmental and economic problems. The price of this ingredient has significantly increased in recent years due to the growing demand for protein ingredients [ 1]. Consequently, there is a need to find and assess alternative sources of protein for animal feed. In this context, Lupinus angustifolius ( L. angustifolius) seed might be an alternative protein source due to its high protein and oil contents.
